Control Name: 4.1.2 Availability targets such as Service Level Agreements (SLAs) and Service Level Objectives (SLOs).
Control Statement: Have availability targets been defined for the application and key scenarios? and are targets considered whilst the system is running in a recovery mode?

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 4.1 What reliability targets and metrics have you defined for your application?
control_attributes.Control: 4.1.2 Availability targets such as Service Level Agreements (SLAs) and Service Level Objectives (SLOs).
control_attributes.Description: Have availability targets been defined for the application and key scenarios? and are targets considered whilst the system is running in a recovery mode?
